description:
Tree Preservation Application At:
146 Hornsey Lane, Islington, London, N6 5NS

TPO Reference:
T1– Sycamore of LBI TPO HIGHVIEW (NO.4) TPO 1981 (T3 on the plan submitted).
T1– Horse Chestnut of LBI TPO (No.2) 1977 (T9 on the plan submitted).
T4– Sycamore of LBI TPO (No.2) 1977 (T2 on the plan submitted).

PO Number:
T090440

Work specifications:

1 x Sycamore (T3) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO HIGHVIEW (NO.4) TPO 1981 (T3 on the plan submitted).
Crown lift up to a maximum height of 5m above ground level.
Prune to give 3m clearance from neighbouring property 

1 x Horse Chestnut (T1) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.2) 1977 (T9 on the plan submitted).
Crown lift up to a maximum height of 8m above ground level.
Crown reduce by up to 20%.

1 x Sycamore (T4) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.2) 1977(T8 on the plan submitted).
Crown lift up to a maximum height of 6m above ground level.
Crown reduce the height by up to 25%.
